name: Broccoli Cheddar Soup Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: A soup that gives comforting vibes, Broccoli Cheddar is a winter season essential. From raw to ready in just 20 minutes, this gluten free blend beats store-bought brands hands-down! Best of all, if you use frozen broccoli you don’t have to chop a single ingredient – onions, garlic, herbs, and spices are all in the blend.
